name: Certificate Course in Community Health for Nurses (CCHN) Training - Document Verification Process

instructions: Candidates are advised to take a printout of the Admit Card/submitted NHM application form or Score Card and issued Offer letter and report at the allocated Program Study Center for completing the Document Verification Process (DVP).
Reporting is scheduled from 14-11-2022 to 24-11-2022 to the Program In-charge at the allocated Program Study Center with required original documents along with one set of self-attested photocopies.
required_documents: Copy of High School mark sheet and Pass Certificate.
Copy of Intermediate mark sheet and Pass Certificate.
Copy of mark sheet of GNM/Post Basic B.Sc Nursing/ B.Sc.Nursing Degree/Certificate from recognized Institute/ University.
Copy of valid Certificate of Registration as Nurses and Midwives from UP Nurses & Midwives Council obtained on or before 09-08-2022.
COVID Experience Certificate issued by the concerned District, if applicable and availed.
Copy of Category Certificate uploaded on Portal by candidate (if applicable).
Copy of ID proof, Permanent/Mailing Address proof.
Two passport size latest color photographs.
Copy of Admit Card/submitted NHM application Form OR Score Card and issued Offer letter.
Applicable Surety Bond for CCHN Training on Non-Judicial stamp paper of Rs. 100/-.
Medical Certificate of Health from Govt. Hospital covering general fitness, report of Chest X-ray, and report of Eye Specialist on vision.
details.contact_details: Candidates are directed to report to the Program In-charge (Superintendent in Chief/Chief Medical Superintendent/Principal-RHFWTCs/ Medical Colleges/ Nursing College/School) at the allocated Program Study Center.

instructions: In case of any issue regarding the CHO Admit Card, the candidate is advised to personally report at the 'Facilitation Counter (Help Desk)' established at the Office of Chief Medical Officer of the respective District on 08-09-2021 between 10:00 AM to 02:00 PM with 2 passport size photographs and identity card along with documentary evidence/proof.
